original: JOSEFSON, Jjudvig, Ingenjör, Malmö, f V Klagstorp, Malmöh l, 27/5 78 av lantbruk J Josefson o Bengta Larsson, gm Ella Trolle. Ex Mmö tekn elem.sk, spec.stud Tyskl. Anst S Sv ångpannefrn i Mmö sed. 98. Fd styr.led Sk ing.klubben o Malmö teknol.frb, styr.led AB Sv torvförädl i Sösdala. FI studieres Tyskl, Engl, Frankr, Finl, Danm, Österr, Polen, Estl. Av trycket: Upps i tekn tidskr :er o IVA medd. RVO, Frimurare, Odd Fellow, Sv teknol.frn, Sk ing.klubben, Mmö teknol.frb mfl frnrar o sällsk, S Sv ångp.frns Hed.M, IVA m j.
translated: JOSEFSON, Jjudvig, Engineer, Malmö, born in Klagstorp, Malmöhög, on May 27, 1878, to the farmers J Josefson and Bengta Larsson, married to Ella Trolle. Former student at Malmö technical elementary school, specialized studies in German. Employed by S Sv ångpannefrn in Malmö since 1898. Former board member of the School Engineers' Club and Malmö technical association, board member of AB Swedish peat processing in Sösdala. Further studies in German, English, France, Finland, Denmark, Austria, Poland, and Estonia. Published in technical journals and the Royal Swedish Academy of Engineering Sciences. Holder of the Royal Order of Vasa, Freemason, Odd Fellow, member of the Swedish Technical Association, School Engineers' Club, Malmö technical association, among others. Honorary Member of S Sv ångpannefrn, Royal Swedish Academy of Engineering Sciences with a machinery department.

structured.name: Jjudvig Josefson
publications: Royal Swedish Academy of Engineering Sciences
